attributes.action: Look in detail at the Justice system today
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government needs to look into the justice system with excruciating detail. On March 15th 2007 a pair were sentenced to four years and a half years in prison for Cruelty to seven children only ending once one of the seven children commited suicide, that means that he/she must have been put through so much that he had to end his own life, and so those two people got... 4 years and 6 months and have only to wait 2 years to be up for parole.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
